message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.GR (Graphics): The paper focuses on mesh denoising, which is a critical technology in geometry processing. This sub-category is the most likely fit for this paper. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper proposes a deep learning-based face normal filtering scheme for mesh denoising. This sub-category deals with image and video processing, which includes mesh processing. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a convolutional neural network-based scheme for guidance normal learning. This sub-category deals with the development of algorithms and models for machine learning. 
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a deep learning-based approach for mesh denoising. This sub-category deals with the development of intelligent agents and systems. 
5. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): The paper proposes a convolutional neural network-based scheme for guidance normal learning. This sub-category deals with the development of neural networks and evolutionary algorithms.
